name: HK Electronics
overview:
Established in the year 1989, we, “H. K. Electronics Pvt. Ltd.”, are a renowned organization engaged in manufacturing and supplying a comprehensive assortment of OC Privacy Switchable Film & Glass. Under this range, we offer quality-approved OC-Outdoor As Sunscreens, OC - Interior Floorings and Skyroof, OC - Hospital Privacy, OC Hospital Privacy, OC for Bussiness Conference Room.

Our Team: Technocrats Engineers Quality controllers Research associates Sales executives

Infrastructure: We have established a state-of-the-art infrastructure, which is spread across the wide space of area. This manufacturing unit is facilitated with sophisticated technology and hi-tech tools and equipment that enable us to offer an impeccable range of OC Privacy Switchable Film & Glass to our customers.

Quality Assurance: Since our commencement, we have laid a great emphasis on the quality of our OC Privacy Switchable Film & Glass. Our firm follows a quality oriented approach right from the procuring of the raw material to the final stage of the manufacturing process.

Client Satisfaction: We are a quality focused organization, who focus on the best-in-class quality OC Privacy Switchable Film & Glass. The quality products offered by us are developed using high quality raw material procured from the most certified vendors of the market.
